original_title: Bethânia Bem de Perto: A Propósito de um Show
overview: Documentary about Maria Bethânia, at the very beginning of her career as a singer, when she arrived in Rio da Bahia to replace Nara Leão in the show Opinião. Bethânia's appearance, at that time in southern Rio, was a cultural shock that shook the city. The film also contains scenes of her daily life and meetings with other musicians.
title: Bethânia Bem de Perto: A Propósito de um Show
